title: How to Plan for Part-Time Retirement
sub_head: Consider your pay cut, health insurance and Social Security benefits
body:
Phased retirement arrangements might be a good fit for older employees who want to scale back on work but arenâ€™t yet ready to leave for good.
Committing to a part-time retirement plan can affect your pay, job responsibilities and benefits. Not everyone can afford to give up pay in return for more free time.
